content.text: Match ends, Sporting Braga 0, Shakhtar Donetsk 3.

Goal!  Sporting Braga 0, Shakhtar Donetsk 3. Douglas Costa (Shakhtar Donetsk) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Paulo César (Sporting Braga) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
